          <title>
            <string language="en">The evolution of a stream</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Entwicklung eines Stromes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'évolution d'un jet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A evolução de um córrego</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εξέλιξη ενός ρεύματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La evolución de una secuencia</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demostrates how a meandering stream evolves through erosion and deposition</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geomorphologic phenomenon</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation die demostrates, wie ein

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui demostrates comment un jet de 
méandre évolue par l'érosion et le dépôt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demostrates como um córrego 
meandering evolui com a erosão e o deposition</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che demostrates come un flusso

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που demostrates πώς ένα ρεύμα 
ελιγμού εξελίσσεται μέσω της διάβρωσης και της απόθεσης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demostrates cómo una 
secuencia de serpenteo se desarrolla con la erosión y la deposición</string>
